resources.string: The description of the COPPA age gate must specify Over-13 and Under-13 URIs.
No URI was provided for an authentication document.
The authentication document did not provide a starting catalog URI.
The account did not specify an authentication type that we can understand.
The description of an OAuth system must contain an authentication URI.
The description of a SAML 2.0 system must contain an authentication URI.
The authentication document was malformed and could not be parsed.
The authentication document could not be retrieved from the server.
The authentication document could not be retrieved from the server.
We couldn\'t understand the authentication document link.
Received an unexpected exception during resolution!
